text: Glamorgan County Cricket Club is the only Welsh cricket team to play in the County Championship and the T20 Blast. They play cricket at Sophia Gardens, Cardiff, Wales.Spotlight on: Glamorgan Cricket Club. www.visitwales.com. Retrieved December 26, 2021 == References == Category:First-class cricket teams in England and Wales Category:Organisations based in Cardiff
title: Glamorgan County Cricket Club
